instruction: Answer the following question by looking at the context if context is given.
context: Nepal ko itihas dherai purano ra samriddha chha. Yaha kai 1768 ma Prithvi Narayan Shah le Nepal lai ekikaran garna suru gare. Tyo bela Nepal bhanda dherai chhoto desh thiyo, ra rajyaharuma bibhajit thiyo. Shah bamsa ko suruwat unai le gareko ho, ra unai le â€˜Nepal ek fulbari hoâ€™ bhanda jati jati ko samanwai ko mahatwa samjhae. Rana shashan ko kaal (1846 dekhi 1951) dherai kusto ra nirankush thiyo, jaha mancheharu lai swatantra bolne adhikar samma thien. 1950 ko kranti pachhi, Nepal le prajatantrik vyavastha ko shuruwat gareko ho, ra naya sambidhan le ek nauya ra loktantrik Nepal ko rooprekha prastut gareko chha. Aaj Nepal ek loktantrik ganatantra ho, jun 2008 ma rajtantra ko antim ra anti ho. Nepal ko rajnitik itihas ko ek arko rochak pahilu sambidhan tyo ho jasma chaar thulathula andolan haru le anek nyaya ko maang garne chhan. Nepal ko mahatwapurna itihas ko aro bhag Gautam Buddha ko janma thau Lumbini ra Kathmandu Upatyaka ma pareko dherai prachin devakutiko avashesh ho, jasma UNESCO World Heritage Sites jasto Swayambhunath ra Pashupatinath sammalit chhan.

response: Nepal ko rajnitik itihas ma Prithvi Narayan Shah le Nepal lai ekikaran garna suru gareko, Rana shashan ko nirankush kaal, 1950 ko kranti, ra 2008 ma rajtantra samapti hunu bisesh ghatna haru hun.

instruction: Answer the following question by looking at the context if context is given.
context: Nepal ek chhoto tara vividha sanskritik desh ho. Yo desh char bhagoma bhaag garincha: Terai, Pahad, Himal, ra Madhesh. Pratyek bhag ko afno biseshta chha. Terai kshetra ma usko samathar bhag, moosam garmi, ra dhan ko kheti ma prasiddha chha. Yaha ka mancheharu madhya Nepali bhanda maithili, Bhojpuri jasto bhasha bolchhan. Pahad kshetra ko jagga ucha ra pahadiya chha, jun majorta kheti patika lagi chalchha. Yaha ka mancheharu Nepali bhasha bolchhan, ra khas ra Newar jasto jatiko rahan-sahan dekhinchha. Himal kshetra ma, jun Nepal ko uttari sima ho, Mahalangur, Annapurna, ra Kanchenjunga jasto Himal ra chiso thau chha. Yaha sherpa jasto jati ko basi ho, jun tourist guide ra mountaineering ma khasai jaanechhan. Madhesh, jun terai ra pahad ko bich ma chha, sahidharu ko thau jasto birgunj, Janakpur yaha chha. Nepal le apno pratibha sansar bhar chharko gareko ho, jasma Gautam Buddha ko janma thau Lumbini ra Sagarmatha (Mount Everest) ko thau jasto biswa prasiddha chha.
question: Nepal ma kun kun kshetra ko biseshta haru chha?
response: Nepal ma char kshetra chhan: Terai dhan ko kheti ma prasiddha ho, Pahad kheti patika lagi uchit chha, Himal mountaineering ra tourist guide ma janne Sherpa ko ghar ho, ra Madhesh sahidharu ra maithili Sanskritik thau ho.

response: I had a wonderful trip with my friends today. Everyone met at the gathering point at 6 in the morning, and we started trekking to enjoy the golden views of the hills. The trekking route was a bit challenging, but everyone encouraged each other to keep going. The lush green forests around us and the cool breeze made the whole day very enjoyable. For lunch, we sat near a flowing river and ate the food we had brought from home. Now, I feel inspired to plan more such adventures in the future.
